results.title: Cognitive function in metformin exposed children, born to mothers with PCOS - follow-up of an RCT
results.text_hl: Association between @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@developmental delay@@@ in offspring, and larger head circumference of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-exposed newborns has been reported.

citations.NLM: Greger HK, Hanem LGE, Østgård HF, Vanky E. Cognitive function in metformin exposed children, born to mothers with PCOS - follow-up of an RCT BMC Pediatr. 2020 Feb 10;20(1):60. PMID: 32039724
citations.BibTeX: @article{32039724, title={Cognitive function in metformin exposed children, born to mothers with PCOS - follow-up of an RCT}, author={Greger HK and Hanem LGE and Østgård HF and Vanky E}, journal={BMC Pediatr}, volume={20}, number={1}, pages={60}}

results.title: Protective effects of metformin against volatile organic compounds-induced developmental toxicity in zebrafish embryos.
results.journal: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol
results.text_hl: Our findings demonstrate @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@'s anti-apoptotic protection against @CHEMICAL_Volatile_Organic_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D055549 @@@VOCs@@@-induced developmental @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@, suggesting its potential as a novel therapeutic intervention for pollution-related @<m>DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@developmental disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Lu J, Li Z, Ruan X, Jin L, Yu X, Zhou X, Zhao J, Wu Y, Chen S, Sun K, Sun J. Protective effects of metformin against volatile organic compounds-induced developmental toxicity in zebrafish embryos. Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2025 Jun 9;296():110250. PMID: 40499703
citations.BibTeX: @article{40499703, title={Protective effects of metformin against volatile organic compounds-induced developmental toxicity in zebrafish embryos.}, author={Lu J and Li Z and Ruan X and Jin L and Yu X and Zhou X and Zhao J and Wu Y and Chen S and Sun K and Sun J}, journal={Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol}, volume={296}, pages={110250}}

results.title: Hippocampus-dependent memory and allele-specific gene expression in adult offspring of alcohol-consuming dams after neonatal treatment with thyroxin or metformin
results.text_hl: The present results indicate that @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@T4@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, administered during the neonatal period that is equivalent to the third trimester of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ pregnancy, are potential treatments for @DISEASE_Fetal_Alcohol_Spectrum_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D063647 @@@FASD@@@ and conceivably for other @<m>DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@neurodevelopmental disorders@@@ with @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive deficits@@@.

citations.NLM: Tunc-Ozcan E, Wert SL, Lim PH, Ferreira A, Redei EE. Hippocampus-dependent memory and allele-specific gene expression in adult offspring of alcohol-consuming dams after neonatal treatment with thyroxin or metformin Mol Psychiatry. 2018 Jul;23(7):1643-1651. PMID: 28727687
citations.BibTeX: @article{28727687, title={Hippocampus-dependent memory and allele-specific gene expression in adult offspring of alcohol-consuming dams after neonatal treatment with thyroxin or metformin}, author={Tunc-Ozcan E and Wert SL and Lim PH and Ferreira A and Redei EE}, journal={Mol Psychiatry}, volume={23}, number={7}, pages={1643-1651}}

results.title: Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes.
results.text_hl: There was no clear evidence of difference in postnatal weight retention between @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ treated with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and those treated with oral anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ pharmacological therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) at six to eight weeks postpartum (MD -1.60 kg, 95% CI -6.34 to 3.14; one study, 167 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence) or one year postpartum (MD -3.70, 95% CI -8.50 to 1.10; one study, 176 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence).

citations.NLM: Brown J, Grzeskowiak L, Williamson K, Downie MR, Crowther CA. Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2017 Nov 5;11(11):CD012037. PMID: 29103210
citations.BibTeX: @article{29103210, title={Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes.}, author={Brown J and Grzeskowiak L and Williamson K and Downie MR and Crowther CA}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, volume={11}, number={11}, pages={CD012037}}

results.title: Mitochondrial biogenesis: pharmacological approaches.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@Mitochondrial dysfunctions@@@ are the prime source of @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@neurodevelopmental disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Valero T. Mitochondrial biogenesis: pharmacological approaches. Curr Pharm Des. 2014;20(35):5507-9. PMID: 24606795
